title: "data_science_profile"
author: "Scott Frazier"
date: "8/22/2021"
output: html_document
---

proficiency_level = c(2,1.5,2,2.5,3,3,2)
subjects = c("Data Viz","Machine Learning","Math","Statistics","Computer Science","Communication","Domain Expertise")

df = data.frame(Proficiency=proficiency_level, Subject=subjects)
df

library(RColorBrewer)
library(ggplot2)
coul = brewer.pal(5, "Blues") 

barplot(df$Proficiency, names.arg = df$Subject, xlab = "Subject", ylab = "Proficiency Level", ylim = c(0,4), col = coul, main = "Data Science Profile")
